Key Match Events: A 163-run stand between Rossouw and de Kock set South Africa up for a big first-innings total
Anrich Nortje completed what he had started, ending with 4 for 10
Shamsi too capitalised on the mountain of a score - courtesy Rossouw's career-best 109 - to get a confidence-boosting 3 for 20
Direct hit at the keeper's end from Rabada! Mahmud easily short of the crease, almost as if he had given up
Good low catch by Stubbs at deep square leg! He had to dive forward with the sun beating down, and did well to keep his eyes on the ball
Pre-Game Insights: Bavuma did exactly the right thing in giving enough play to the spinners as well in this sort of a game to find the necessary rhythm under the conditions and get cracking for the matches ahead
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib: 'Our plans were fine but the execution was completely off'
Ngidi: When the competition gets closer it makes for better cricket

S Sinha: 'Bavuma did exactly the right thing in giving enough play to the spinners as well in this sort of a game to find the necessary rhythm under the conditions and get cracking for the matches ahead'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa rolled Bangladesh over for less that half of what they had scored
South Africa will be table toppers at least for a short while
They hold a huge net run rate at the moment - remember they couldn't make the semi-final last year just due to the NRR?
